column4: does anybody know why i don't have any network list in my xchat ?
copy the the text at http://pastie.org/646808 into ~/.xchat2/servlist_.conf and see if that works
it doesn't have a list of servers. Paste my version http://pastie.org/646808 in to replace it (back up first) and change the v=2.8.6 on my first line to v=2.8.4 (hopefully the format is consistent)
